entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
